Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The motion event that occurred during the context click.
onContextClick(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: Notified when a context click occurs.

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The first down motion event that started the scrolling.
MotionEvent: The move motion event that triggered the current onScroll.
float: The distance along the X axis that has been scrolled since the last call to onScroll. This is NOT the distance between e1 and e2.
float: The distance along the Y axis that has been scrolled since the last call to onScroll. This is NOT the distance between e1 and e2.
onScroll(android.view.MotionEvent,androi.Description: Notified when a scroll occurs with the initial on down @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ and the current move @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@. The distance in x and y is also supplied for convenience.
onScroll(android.view.MotionEvent,androi.FullName: public boolean onScroll (MotionEvent e1, MotionEvent e2, float distanceX, float distanceY)

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The down motion event of the single-tap.
onSingleTapConfirmed(android.view.Motion.Description: Notified when a single-tap occurs. Unlike @B_android#view#GestureDetector#OnGestureListener#onSingleTapUp_E@, this will only be called after the detector is confident that the user's first tap is not followed by a second tap leading to a double-tap gesture.

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The up motion event that completed the first tap
onSingleTapUp(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: Notified when a tap occurs with the up @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ that triggered it.

Parameters: MotionEvent: The initial on down motion event that started the longpress.
onLongPress(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: Notified when a long press occurs with the initial on down @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ that trigged it.

onDown(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: Notified when a tap occurs with the down @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ that triggered it. This will be triggered immediately for every down event. All other events should be preceded by this.

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The motion event that occurred during the double-tap gesture.
onDoubleTapEvent(android.view.MotionEven.Description: Notified when an event within a double-tap gesture occurs, including the down, move, and up events.

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The first down motion event that started the fling.
MotionEvent: The move motion event that triggered the current onFling.
float: The velocity of this fling measured in pixels per second along the x axis.
float: The velocity of this fling measured in pixels per second along the y axis.
onFling(android.view.MotionEvent,android.Description: Notified of a fling event when it occurs with the initial on down @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ and the matching up @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@. The calculated velocity is supplied along the x and y axis in pixels per second.
onFling(android.view.MotionEvent,android.FullName: public boolean onFling (MotionEvent e1, MotionEvent e2, float velocityX, float velocityY)

onShowPress(android.view.MotionEvent).Description: The user has performed a down @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ and not performed a move or up yet. This event is commonly used to provide visual feedback to the user to let them know that their action has been recognized i.e. highlight an element.

Returns: true if the event is consumed, else false
Parameters: MotionEvent: The down motion event of the first tap of the double-tap.

ClassDesc: A convenience class to extend when you only want to listen for a subset of all the gestures. This implements all methods in the @B_android#view#GestureDetector#OnGestureListener_E@, @B_android#view#GestureDetector#OnDoubleTapListener_E@, and @B_android#view#GestureDetector#OnContextClickListener_E@ but does nothing and return false for all applicable methods.
